title: stuck in account recovery
body:
so I lodged a ticket and for no reason the riot employee started putting me through and account recovery I didn't ask for and so after a week of trying to do that they said no and if I have more information to respond and gave a link which they said they have updated my ticket here 
the link just goes to a 404 page and when I tried to respond it said I was blocked 
I just want my account back 
I didn't provide my ip and credit card details because I didn't think they were necessary but I still can 
this I really frustrating because I have rare skins that I really like
like kitty katarina

replies.body: It looks like your account was locked for safety due to suspicious activity.  You'll want to fill out a separate [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) for this, and our account team will be able to get the account safely back in your hands.
